traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The elf makes two Longsword or Radiant Ray attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (4d10 damage) radiant damage.
